website_summaries.verdict: Well-made gloves that are very warm and flexible. A good choice for bitter cold temperatures and riders who don't mind that they only come in flashy colors.
pros: These gloves earn praise for having a unique three-finger design with superior warmth and dexterity
Suitable for various temperatures thanks to the three reliable heat settings
cons: Only available in bright orange or green, which won't appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: Warm, well-made, functional
customer_reviews.text: This is the first set of these battery operated gloves I have owned from this company. I had an earlier set from another company - those did not keep fingers warm, they excelled at keeping my palms warm, but fingers froze. These do not have that problem. The heating elements are where they should be: covering the back of the hand, the fingers and thumb. The three-level heating works excellently and the buttons regulating the heat level can be pushed with the gloves on. Having the thumb and index finger separate from the mitten section works very well. The exterior of the glove is well made with leather. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Ruddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Road Jobs
customer_reviews.text: I'm frequently directing traffic and these new style gloves, being bright yellow-green perfectly match my safety jacket. Bought these a few days ago and three people commented on them today at the site I was working! The isolated index finger and thumb are individually heated as well... right up to the tip of the fingers. Used it on the medium level and it lasted 3 hours so an additional pack of batteries (or two) would be essential. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Work well, fit large hands
customer_reviews.text: This was the second pair of heated gloves I bought last year. My son had a different pair on his Christmas list so I had simply clicked the link he sent me and ordered them. Thankfully I was early doing my shopping. The pair he requested would not have fit him, so they went to a different family member with smaller hands. These however fir my 6’2” tall son quite well. We live in a cold, snowy area and he works outside. These will help make his job easier to do.
customer_reviews.author: punpers

customer_reviews.title: not much heat
customer_reviews.text: I used these gloves when out clearing the snow with the snow blower or shoveling. The first time I used them they were fine but it was at the park walking my dog. The next few times while walking her I noticed the right glove was not heating as much as the left & the last time I felt very little to no heat in the right glove & using the snow blower was the same thin, nothing for heat so I returned them, no idea why they quit working?
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good finger and hand dexterity .
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately , although very comfortable , I have found that the two highest settings drain the battery too quickly for my liking , as I have worn them while clearing snow and going for walks . Also I feel this mitt - glove , the lone finger is exposed by the cold in as little as -20 C , on med. setting .
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for the rider not wanting the bother of plugging in equipment... rode in low 30 deg temps and had to turn gloves down because my hands started to sweat... good battery life as well... only warning - if you have grips that are very close to control levers it will be hard to move hands back and forth on controls.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the chill away!
customer_reviews.text: Have used two times for about 6 non continuous hours of skiing in temperatures well below 32F. Would put on high before putting on, then put on low to ski. My fingers are thin so the mitts really don't wrap to my hand. The mittens are comfortable, keep my hands dry,and flex just enough. I would flex my fingers on the lift to reach the heating elements on the back of the fingers. Thumb isn't as toasty as I hoped, but it's sooo much better than it was. The batteries kept charged and working both days. For about half the price of some other heated gloves/mittens these are a winner.
customer_reviews.author: A Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves ever
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are seriously the best things ever! I was so excited to get these, my hands get so cold &they heat up incredibly well. Even on the lowest setting. Ilike how the left 3 fingers are grouped together, cause i mean, who is those anyway, &then the others are independent & can be functional. Great design. The materials are durable & well stitched. The battery life lasts long enough for many trips outside without charging in between. I did a little video to show what they look like.
customer_reviews.author: SarahLydia

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: They heat up in 30 seconds the quality is A+ , measurements are right for sizing also. pricey though whew-got a pair for my dad on x mas , had to get myself a pair . zero complaints ,, nothing like slipping on warm gloves after unkooking a fish while ice fishing . And two fingers being free to reel helps too.
customer_reviews.author: greg p

customer_reviews.title: Great Heated Leather Glove
customer_reviews.text: These gloves really work in keeping hands warm while snow blowing and shoveling. The product info was very accurate. The batteries lasted slightly longer in the low mode than advertised. Recharged the batteries and they performed great. I like the soft reinforced leather palms, and three finger design for added flexibility in picking things up without removing gloves. Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Gloves heat the tops of your hands!
customer_reviews.text: I like how well these "lobster" gloves keep my hands warm. They heat the TOP of my hands, which is different from another pair of heated gloves I purchased that heat the PALMS of my hands. I prefer this pair. I use the gloves mainly when I walk my dog in the park on really cold Vermont days. My walks are usually 30-45 minutes. I need to recharge the batteries every 3 or 4 walks.
customer_reviews.author: VermontBaba

customer_reviews.title: high was plenty warm for -10f.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life expectation was exactly as advertised. 6 hours on low, 4 hours on medium and 2 hours on high. I was plenty warm in 15-20 degree weather without using the battery which was very impressive compared to the high end non-heated gloves I have. The recharge cycle is about 6-8 hours. Only negative is they do not have a wrist strap to keep them tethered when you take them off. If they last at least 100 ski days then I will buy these again instead of paying 2.5 times for the high end brands.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Perfect Fit.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and they should be. Took 2 hrs to charge and then the instructions recommend adding another 30 mins for the first charge. I bought the x-large and fit perfectly with my hands. The color is really cool and the material of the gloves is quality. They heat up fast going into with cold hands. Best gloves I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gloves for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for skiing in icy cold Montana! Had other leather heated gloves previously, but they kept breaking. Not these. Worked perfectly and bought an extra set of batteries which I switched at lunchtime so the claw mitts kept my hands warm all day!! The leather quality is beautiful. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vickster

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves no size tag
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty awesome! Started with hand warmers in used level one two or three as needed during 4-5 hour ski days in 4-25 degrees Fahrenheit.. these are good for keeping hands warm . They sent wrong size on order which we were going to return but ended up gifting. No size marker in gloves is a bit odd.. wouldn’t have probably known that they sent large instead of medium but had larges already.. second set was narrower and slightly shorter but identical tags L9 in all gloves.. ?
customer_reviews.author: Mike c

customer_reviews.title: Better than numb fingers
customer_reviews.text: Bit big for women’s sizing. The battery is heavy and they need recharging frequently. BUT they do Jeep my fingers warm and (on low) last a long time on a charge. I wish the battery were much smaller (I’ve got to think they could have sone that at this price point)
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle ride to work
customer_reviews.text: In 50 degree weather, the mittens are warm all by themselves. Feel a bit chilly, simply poke the on button and feel your fingers warm up. Be careful you don't accidently squeeze the on button when you put them away. On high they discharge pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gann

customer_reviews.title: Nice three finger gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves. Nice soft leather. The orange have a dark navy blue hue instead of black. Warm and cozy. Just NOT for motorcycle riding, so I had to return them. No dexterity at all. Great for skiing though. A little bigger than I expected for an XXL.
customer_reviews.author: Pacman

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Sizing runs quite small, I Purchased these for skiing and I am always a size xl glove. After 2 exchanges I ended up with a Size XXXL that seems to be sized suitably . I would say they’re XL feels like a medium to large , their XXL feels like a large , and XXXL like an XL. it would be much better if the fingers are pre-curved as when you grip a ski pole there’s extra material in the palm that interferes somewhat. The overall quality seems to be very good and I look forward to trying them at the beginning of ski season
customer_reviews.author: G OOOO TTRS

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for those cold days
customer_reviews.text: Just came back from 6 days of skiing at Keystone. Love the gloves, their design and ease of use. I got a spare set of batteries just in Case. If you crank them up to high they will get very toastie but you will also drain the batter after a few hours I’m very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Almost warm enough!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves appear to be well made. They heat the hands much better than several others I tried. Unfortunately, they still lack full heating of the fingers. I kept them, because it appears they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Providing feedback

customer_reviews.title: Seemed good
customer_reviews.text: But I didn't notice they were more mitten-like than gloves, so I returned them and bought another pair with 5 fingers.
customer_reviews.author: mjt

customer_reviews.title: Good bye numb hands
customer_reviews.text: They work great. I'm 59 live in Oregon and have bad circulation in my hands and ride my bike year round and they get really cold. And these glove work great for me. They heat up fast and the batteries last more than I need on a bike ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fair price
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality was great. I didn't have them long enough to rate the performance as my hands are quite large and I may need to find someone that can supply a size 4xl glove as these were too snug in the mitten part of the glove. I returned them and will try a regular 5 finger 3xl glove from Savior.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Spitzner

customer_reviews.title: I had to keep them on high and my thumbs were cold
customer_reviews.text: I had to keep them on high to stay warm and my thumbs were cold
customer_reviews.author: Audrey S Keller

customer_reviews.title: The function for me as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Preparations for bike riding out, for cold Winter months 2019 /2020 Tested Gloves, they work excellent, as advertised
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves, bad charger.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11yr old son. XS was still a bit big. They are pretty warm even without the batteries. Batteries on low make it through most of a ski day. On medium or high don’t make it the whole day. Biggest problem was the charger didn’t work. Returned the item and new one didn’t work either. Contacted company which was very responsive and got me a working one.
customer_reviews.author: scott bilyeu

customer_reviews.title: The work great
customer_reviews.text: I've used these kayaking on Lake Michigan in December and they worked great. Will be trying then out snowshoeing and going soon. Warm right down to the finger tips.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heated gloves
customer_reviews.text: I've used these about 10 times snow skiing in very cold weather and they are great. Very Durable and battery lasts all day on low setting. Very nice leather...love the orange color. Don't know how I skied so many years without them!!!
customer_reviews.author: karajust

customer_reviews.title: Cycling in the winter
customer_reviews.text: My husband bikes to work when he can. This is an hour commute by bike. We live in Kansas and the weather is cold in the winter months! These gloves allow him to keep his hands warm and he gets his ride in.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Beikmann

customer_reviews.title: Best Gloves for extreme (midwest USA) winters
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these gloves, glove of choice when temp in the teens or below. Gets lots of complements from associates
customer_reviews.author: A. Botello

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves and they keep your finger tips warm and toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hands nice and toasty during cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my hands nice and toasty during cold weather. Like the on/off button, compared to other gloves without.
customer_reviews.author: JOHNSJ1953

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These mittens are not only comfortable to wear, they are very effective keeping hands warm all the way through clearing the snow from a 200' straight and curved driveway.
customer_reviews.author: ArthurVernon

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gloves. Love the fit and heat output is great. I had a little issue with the heat not working on part of the right glove. But they made it right within 1 day of my email. Now that’s customer service! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought these 10 years ago. About 10 people on chair lifts asked me about these gloves--get them now. The right index finger got cold, though. I would give 5 stars if they had a lanyard to hook over wrists for more security so not to lose them on the chair lifts while making adjustments or using phone.
customer_reviews.author: ML York

customer_reviews.title: Winter Riding Gloves
customer_reviews.text: The BEST yet 👍🥶 !! I ride motorcycle all Winter ❄️. No one likes COLD hands . You will not be disappointed. Big John 🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mittens but the fit a little small
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality of the product when it came out of the box and the design is great. However, I have extra large hands so I purchased the largest pair of mittens. Unfortunately my hands didn't stay warm because the mittens were a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept my husband’s hands warm the whole football game.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint was the the batteries didn’t last the whole game. He concluded that he should have turned them off once the gloves were warm.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband he works outside a lot in the winter and he lives them. He says they are the best thing ever. Very comfortable heat up quick.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are great so far. I use them for ranch chores which as yet they have withstood with no sign of failure.
customer_reviews.author: Medjool Addict

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the quality and works pretty well. Battery keeps a pretty good charge.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Quality of construction.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very well constructed. Was not able to put them through the test. Was expecting to use them in North Dakota where the temperature is usually below zero in January, it was 25 to 44 degrees. Worked fine but didn't have to have them on for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for a week but I used them to fly down the river in a fishing boat when it was 25 degrees and my hands were not a bit cold. I love them so far. I recommend getting a size larger than you think you need because they are a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Travis D.

customer_reviews.title: Warm gloves for the wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for the wife so her hands wouldn't get cold on the slopes. She had loved them and therefore I do too. Plenty of battery life and very warm even on lowest setting
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: well made nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I like all about the gloves except the indicator red light is like a becon in the dark
customer_reviews.author: John Fucillo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality glove initially. Too early to speak on longevity.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice fit and kept my hands comfortably warm without being too hot. A little expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Troy M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these mittens, if you want your hands to stay warm.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time and went skiing in my hands did not get cold. I was in ski heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Pergricht

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for motorcycle riding. My hands went from coldest to warmest part of my ride. The orange is more of a red/orange and they are a bit like lobster hands but i like having my index free of the mitten. I wish the cuff was more of a gauntlet but its elastic and can fit iver or under my jacket. Glad i bought these gloves for those cold morning rides
customer_reviews.author: ryan n.

product_meta.description:
If you've struggled to find gloves that keep your hands warm in chilly winter, turn to the Savior Heated Mitts. These heated mitten gloves have everything you will need to brave the toughest weather conditions.

Features

✔1.Innovative design

Great gloves that guarantee both warmth and dexterity 

✔2.Comfortable and Breathable

Premium materials make these heated mittens very durable and comfortable. And you won't need to worry about the sweaty hands with heated gloves on. 

✔3.Long Lasting Warmth

This battery heated gloves with 2200Mah rechargeable Li-ion batteries to ensure long working time.

FAQs


Q1: I don’t know how to get it work


A1 : Press ON/OFF button once to enter HIGH heat setting (3 light bars will illuminate)

Press ON/OFF button a second time to reduce the heat by switching to MEDIUM level (2 light bars will illuminate)

Press ON/OFF button a third time to reduce the heat by switching to LOW level (1 light bar will illuminate)

Press ON/OFF button of fourth time to turn off the heat system of the gloves(all lightbars will shut off)

Q2: Can I machine wash the gloves?

A2 : Machine wash is not recommended as it damage the inside electrical heated components. Spot clean the gloves by hand with only mild detergent.

Q3: The winter gloves only heated for about 30 minutes then went off when i first use it.

A3 : Most of batteries won’t arrive in fully charged status so that’s why you need to recharge them for at least 4 hours when you receive it.

Q4: Does it work under sub zero area?

A4 : Yes,it does. Enjoy extra warmth on your hands no matter what you're doing outside

【Superior Material】These heated ski gloves come zith soft lambskin leather on whole palm, back of hand and fingers, which is water resistant and windproof. Inside these electric gloves there is a heated layer sandwiched between a breathable soft fleece layer and a insulated cotton layer . Besides, this pair of heated work gloves features an adjustable wrist belt design that ensures a customized fit for men and women.

【Flexible Three Fingers Design】These 3 fingers heated gloves come with a split-finger design for dexterity in extremely cold weather. Its mitten design allows your thumb and index finger to grasp something as well. Two separate fingers provide more flexibility for gripping skiing devices like ski pole or snowboard and your smart phones.

【Rechargeable Li-ion Batteries & 3 Heat Settings】With ON/OFF button on the back of the heated mittens, you can freely adjust the temperature in 3 levels to obtain appropriate warmth. Instant heating up makes your hands warmer in 30 seconds.The heated mitts include a pair of rechargeable lithium batteries that can be fully charged in 2-3 hours. We suggest you adjust to high setting for first 20 min and then switch to medium setting to ensure a long-lasting warming effect for outdoor use.

【Warm Gloves Wide Application】The ungraded heating gloves use far infrared heating elements which is good for blood circulation, especially helpful for people who suffer from Raynaud's, Arthritis, Stiff Joints. Perfect sports snow gloves for biking, running, fishing, skiing, camping, hiking; snow plowing and walking in cold weather. A warm gift to yourself, lover, friends, parents, elders for Christmas Thanksgiving; Birthday, New Year's, etc.

【Service】One Year Quality assurance, If you have any questions about quality, size, battery or charger of these winter gloves, please feel free to contact us. We will definitely give you a satisfactory solution. Share them with your friends ,if you like these rechargable heated gloves .They will thank you for the warmth.
